jobDescription: Provide customer-focused analytical services to CenCal Health’s management team.Provide customer-focused reporting services to CenCal staff, in support of CenCal’s medical claims processing.To create analytic and data warehouse reports using BI tools to support CenCal Health’s management team and staff.Assist in the development and implementation of solutions to continually support CenCal management to meet ongoing strategic objectives.Collaborate with leadership to implement processes to achieve and monitor operational effectiveness and efficiency.To promote and further efforts to increase CenCal data quality and integrity; To ensure the quality and integrity of CenCal reporting through the implementation of standards based measures as defined by CenCal staff.Supply information for strategic decision-making and oversight to stimulate operational improvement and assure regulatory compliance.Collaborate with the plan’s medical management to support measurement of industry standard process and outcome indicators, identification and elimination of barriers to improvement, and identification of appropriate interventions.Instruct staff in the use of business intelligence tools to independently analyze and use data to stimulate and achieve improvement.Represent the IT and the Data Analysis and Informatics Team on inter-departmental project teams as required to improve organizational quality.Lead activities to implement tactics and achieve strategic objectives.Verify data gathering processes and the accuracy and validity of analyses provided to internal and/or external customers.Other duties as assigned.
